SELECT si.shipping_instruction_seq, si.shipping_instruction_name, si.shipping_instruction_status, si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, c.client_name, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(i.item_name SEPARATOR ", ") FROM tb_shipping_instruction_item sii JOIN tb_item i ON i.item_seq = sii.item_seq WHERE si.shipping_instruction_seq = sii.shipping_instruction_seq ) AS item_name FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE si.shipping_instruction_status NOT IN ('DELETE')
AND #{request.startDate} <= si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date
AND #{request.endDate} >= si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date
AND c.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.clientName}, '%')
AND si.shipping_instruction_status IN
#{status}
ORDER BY si.shipping_instruction_reg_date DESC
LIMIT #{request.size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE si.shipping_instruction_status NOT IN ('DELETE')
AND #{request.startDate} <= si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date
AND #{request.endDate} >= si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date
AND c.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.clientName}, '%')
AND si.shipping_instruction_status IN
#{status}

SELECT si.shipping_instruction_seq, si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, si.shipping_instruction_total_quantity, si.shipping_instruction_address, u.user_name, si.shipping_instruction_note FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_user u ON (si.user_seq = u.user_seq) WHERE si.shipping_instruction_seq = #{shippingInstructionSeq}

SELECT sii.shipping_instruction_item_seq, sii.item_seq, i.item_image_url, i.item_name, i.item_division, sii.shipping_instruction_item_quantity, sii.shipping_instruction_item_note FROM tb_shipping_instruction_item sii JOIN tb_item i ON sii.item_seq = i.item_seq WHERE sii.shipping_instruction_seq = #{shippingInstructionSeq}

SELECT si.shipping_instruction_seq, si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, DATE_FORMAT(si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, '%Y/%m') shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_month_date, si.shipping_instruction_name, FORMAT(si.shipping_instruction_total_quantity, 0) shipping_instruction_total_quantity, c.client_name, si.shipping_instruction_address, si.shipping_instruction_note, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(si.shipping_instruction_total_quantity), 0), 0) shipping_instruction_total_quantity_sum FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE si.shipping_instruction_status NOT IN ('DELETE')
AND #{request.startDate} <= si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date
AND #{request.endDate} >= si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date
AND c.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.clientName}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, '%Y/%m'), si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date WITH ROLLUP;

SELECT soi.item_seq AS item, soi.sales_order_item_quantity - NVL(( SELECT SUM(sii.shipping_instruction_item_quantity) FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_shipping_instruction_item sii ON (si.shipping_instruction_seq = sii.shipping_instruction_seq) WHERE si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq AND sii.item_seq = item AND si.shipping_instruction_status NOT IN ("DELETE") ), 0) AS remaining_quantity FROM tb_sales_order so JOIN tb_sales_order_item soi ON (so.sales_order_seq = soi.sales_order_seq) WHERE so.sales_order_seq = #{salesOrderSeq}
